data.name: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
data.detailed_description:
Imagine a world where every scary story told to you turned out to be true, This is the world of Terrordrome where these monsters effect the real world unknown to humans who live their regular day to day life.
Discover these stories in a new light with the main protagonist Alex Van Helsing as he ventures his way to take down Dracula once and for all whilst meeting new allies and enemies along the way with playable characters like Frankenstein's Monster, Bigfoot, Bloody Mary and much more like some original monsters to create one of the most unique horror crossovers using as much as we can in the general public media to avoid lawsuits.
with a set roster with characters like these, expect each with a unique and interesting moveset which contrasts with each other creating a fun long lasting fighter full of bloody violence, terror and intense action.

The games early access contains:
6 Playable Characters
5 Playable Stages
An arcade mode
Online Mode
Player vs Player
Player vs CPU
CPU vs CPU
Training Mode
Options

Playable Characters


Frankenstein



Sasquatch



Alex Van Helsing



Neverman



Bloody Mary


T.H.I.S


Mr. Hyde


White Lady






Characters coming soon

Dracula



Wendigo



Invisible Man



Spring Heeled Jack





Officially part of 2021 Yogscast Tiny Teams Festival

data.short_description: Terrordrome Reign Of The Legends is an indie fighting game set in a world where characters from horror literature, urban legends, cryptids, mythology exist within our modern world. This spiritual successor to Terrordrome Rise of the Boogeymen will be the perfect fighting game for all fans of horror.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 18363.836
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20GHz / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 18363.836 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700k CPU @ 3.70GHz or Higher / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 or Higher / AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: Terrordrome Reign Of The Legends contains core violence evolving blood, pain, mild gore and multiple methods of murder.
